Description: You will find everything you need and want at our St. Charles, MD apartment community. Come home to Westchester at the Pavilions with one, two, and three bedroom floor plans, built with your comfort in mind. Our apartment homes feature first-class features sure to complement any lifestyle. Each of our kitchens are equipped with stainless steel appliances. You will enjoy the appeal of 9-foot vaulted ceilings with fans, wood-style flooring, walk-in closets, and built-in nooks in select apartments. Residents of our luxury community like our picnic pavilion, swimming pool, and children pool area. We also have four playgrounds and two tennis courts. Plus, a location near Waldorf, MD that makes commuting easy.

Description: BRAND NEW-NOW OPEN! At Abberly Square you will experience exceptional living, squarely within reach. Residents will have an array of options to choose from including one, two, and three bedroom floor plans ranging in size from 715 to nearly 1,500 spacious square feet. With 19 large, unique floor plans, we have a something for all lifestyles. Discover the comfort of spacious floor plans with designer touches such as designer kitchens with gorgeous mocha wood cabinets with granite counter tops, deep, soaking tubs or glass enclosed showers, stunning 9-10' ceilings with triple crown molding and the list goes on and on. Grab a good book and soak up the sun at the invigorating pool with large sundeck and private cabanas. Challenge friends to a competitive game of billiards or foosball in the S Lounge. Go for a stimulating workout in the Adrenaline Cardio & Strength Studio or enjoy a casual afternoon stroll on the winding walking trails. Enjoy the ideal location within minutes of upscale shopping, dining and recreation and the benefit of easy commutes to Washington, DC, Northern Virginia and the Beltway. At Abberly Square, you will love having our customer focused onsite management and maintenance team. Our onsite Leasing Center will be opened 7 days a week to offer quality services year round.

Description: Imagine space, luxury, location and value all in one apartment community! Center Pointe Apartment homes are creatively detailed with attractive features which include fully equipped gourmet kitchens with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, dishwashers, wood-style floors, new energy star windows, some with washer and dryer connections, and more! Center Pointe is centrally located in Waldorf off US Route 301/Crain Highway just minutes from everything that is Southern Maryland and only 23 miles south-southeast of our Nations’ Capital. Promoted as the “shopping capital of Southern Maryland,” Waldorf offers many restaurants, shops and St. Charles Town Center Mall. Known primarily as a commuter town or exurb, many residents of Waldorf enjoy the peaceful setting and green space offered here, but commute to employment in Washington, DC, Andrews Air Force Base and points further north.

Description: Welcome to Adams Crossing Apartments! Brand new affordable apartment living in Charles County. Located in Waldorf, Maryland minutes away from many area conveniences. The area's entertainment choices include Thomas Stone High School Outdoor Public Pool, St Charles Parkway Skate Park, White Plains Regional Park, Mattawoman Recreation Center. Enjoy several summer camps, youth sports programs, Indian Head Bike/Walking Trail, White Plains Dog Park and the Waldorf West Library. We are close to great shopping at nearby St. Charles Center Mall and Waldorf Market Place. Both the local elementary and middle schools are very close by. Dining choices for the area include a variety of choices ranging from casual to gourmet. Adams Crossing Apartments are just off Route 5/Leonardtown Road, minutes to Route 301 Crain Highway, and within convenient commuting distance to DC and Northern VA. Access to the Park & Ride Shuttle is just minutes away, providing easy commuting options into DC. Our 192-unit apartment community provides spacious two and three bedroom residences that have been designed with finishes that are both modern and comfortable. Designed to fit the way you live, Adams Crossing Apartments provides its residents affordable luxury. Each apartment features great room designs with wall to wall carpet, large kitchen islands, granite countertops with a double sink, private balcony/patio, full sized washers and dryers, and spacious bedrooms with true walk-in closets. Community amenities include a resort-style pool with fountains, a fully equipped fitness center, grilling area with picnic tables, 24-hr internet Café, and 24-hr emergency maintenance. Visit out Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Adams-Crossing-Apartments/715099328584900

Description: Welcome to The Townes at Holly Station's premier residences where modern comfort and style come standard. Our townhomes truly offer the balance of space and serenity as each residence is thoughtfully designed to meet your needs, while situated in a setting with beautiful views of the outdoors giving you room to enjoy your everyday delights in Waldorf, MD. The Townes at Holly Station offers two and three bedroom townhomes that feature exclusive community and household amenities like a sparkling swimming pool, 24-hour fitness center, clubhouse, valet waste service, and BBQ area. Come wiggle your toes in our picturesque pool, tone up in the state of the art fitness center, or stroll through our pet-friendly community with your favorite furry companion. We know you deserve the very best in apartment living, and our community is designed specifically to ensure you don't just lease, you live. View your new home. Go take a look at our photo gallery and schedule your appointment, or drop by

Description: The Links at Gleneagles is your link to better living. These brand new one, two and three bedroom apartments offer every modern convenience you would expect to find in a home, plus many more luxuries to enhance your lifestyle. Adjacent to White Plains Regional Park, you're just steps from an 18-hole golf course, tennis courts and the most extensive series of hiking and biking trails in Charles County. A complimentary membership to the Community Center, which boasts a resort-style swimming pool, tennis courts and clubhouse, lets you to take advantage of even more recreational fun. And that's just the beginning. From designer kitchens to a location only minutes from the area's best shopping, dining and entertainment, The Links at Gleneagles is a place you'll want to call home.

Description: This newly built 3 bedroom / 4 bathroom townhome is located in the exclusive Fairway Village Association of Waldorf, in the heart of Southern Maryland's suburban living and close to DC. This Townhome boasts approximately 2550 SqFt of living space including a private balcony for BBQing and relaxing. Enjoy HARDWOOD FLOORING and CERAMIC TILE throughout this luxurious townhome. There are three bedrooms that are conveniently located on the third floor - far above any noise below. Complimented with a completely new interior, this cozy, modern, and contemporary home has plenty of amenities for the SOPHISTICATED PROFESSIONAL. Pool, BBQ, Tennis Courts, Pool Table, and Community Center are all within walking distance and included. This townhome features many windows to see the front balcony, fenced-in backyard, and tree lined streets, a pleasant neighborhood, and a convenient living environment in one of the most convenient locations in all of Southern Maryland. There is direct access to the grassy backyard for the kids to play or to take the dog out, and direct access to the 2-car Garage for easy loading/unloading. Laundry is on the 3rd floor, so no more steps between you and the laundry room. See the full listing and more full-resolution pictures here: http://www.armadamanagement.org/olympiaplace.html

Description:
This 3 story end unit townhouse is located in the Berry Valley subdivision and features a garage and fenced in back yard with a small shed. 3 bedrooms and 2 full tiled bathrooms occupy the top floor, with a garden tub in the Master Bathroom. The main floor has wooden floors, an open kitchen/dining area, with a deck off of the kitchen down into the back yard. A spacious family room with a fireplace and rear entrance are in your lower level, with a half bath and access to the garage. Close to schools, shopping and airport.
STATUS: Vacant 
AVAILABLE DATE: Now 
*Other terms, fees, and conditions may apply. Check the listing at realpmgold.com for details. 
SHOWING INSTRUCTIONS: To schedule a showing please call (301) 744-8700. Secure Lockbox Code will be provided (verification of identity is required). 
UTILITIES INCLUDED: Trash
PET RULE: No pets allowed
BREED RESTRICTIONS: Check with mgr for exceptions: Snakes over 3lbs, Ferrets, Exotic Animals, Birds, German Shepherd, Doberman, Chow, Rottweiler, Akita, American Staffordshire Terrier, Pit Bull, Presa Canario, Great Dane, Wolf Hybrid 
SMOKING: No Smoking Allowed in or on the Property 
LEASE LENGTH: 12-36 month minimum 
SPECIAL LEASE PROVISIONS: If not specified here, will be listed in lease agreement. 
HOW TO APPLY: The applications are found on our website, www.realpmgold.com/houses-rent located on the listing page. 
APPLICATION TURNAROUND TIME: 24 to 72 business hours 
ADDITIONAL FEES NOT INCLUDED IN RENT: 
* $50 Application Fee per applicant 18 or older 
* Deposit: 100% refundable, 
* $250 - $500 pet deposit per pet (if applicable) (100% refundable) 
Income Requirements -Minimum Gross Income Requirement (before taxes) is 3 times the rental rate of the property you would like to rent. 
Credit Requirements- Credit above 600 is preferred, however as long as there are no evictions on record and proof of rent or mortgage payment history is supplied showing on time rent payments for the previous year the applications with credit in the 500's will be considered. Student loans and medical bills will not be factored against the applicant. 
Security Deposits -Applicants with better credit and references will generally be approved at a security deposit of 1 months rent. Applicants with low credit may be approved with higher deposit.
Rental Terms: Rent: $2,000, Application Fee: $50, Security Deposit: $2,000, Available Now
Pet Policy: Cats not allowed, Dogs not allowed
This property allows self guided viewing without an appointment. Contact for details.

Description: Beautiful well maintained large end unit town house with fenced back yard! Kitchen boasts granite counter tops and space for dining table. Huge family room with bay window and formal dining room on main level! Upstairs has three large bedrooms and two full baths. Neighborhood offers playgrounds swimming pool lake walking paths and much more! App fee is 35 per applicant 18 years or older.

Description:
(301) 710-5274 - Pinewood Drive 2788 - This Custom built home offers over 3000 square foot of living space. Well maintained yard with covered front porch. The home offers 5 bedrooms, 3 full baths, spacious family room with fireplace, formal living room, large kitchen w/solid wood cabinets, wood flooring, breakfast room and separate dining room. Beautiful open foyer with wood flooring. Spacious master bedroom suite with sitting area, Full Master Bath w/ Whirlpool Jet tub and separate shower. Beautiful addition with exposed wood beams is the perfect area for entertaining or just relaxing. Through the double doors from the addition there is a spacious well maintained fenced in rear yard. Enjoy your privacy while sitting on the rear covered deck/porch. Detached shed for storage. This home has so much to offer , call today for your private showing !
(RLNE3596510)

Description:
This renovated 2 story single family home has 4 bds, 2.5 ba, and is getting a facelift with new siding and roof in the near future! The kitchen features new appliances, cabinets, counters, and a tiled backsplash. Freshly painted walls, upgraded bathrooms, and new floors, with a washer and dryer on site. Attached storage shed on back of house on deck. The fenced in back yard has a separate shed, and a deck that is also getting a facelift. Tucked back into a circle drive, the home is in walking distance to schools, community center, and pool. Close to shopping, activities, and is a great commute location. 
STATUS: Vacant 
AVAILABLE DATE: Now 
*Other terms, fees, and conditions may apply. Check the listing at realpmgold.com for details. 
SHOWING INSTRUCTIONS: To schedule a showing please call (301) 744-8700. Secure Lockbox Code will be provided (verification of identity is required). 
UTILITIES INCLUDED: None 
PET RULE: No pets allowed
SMOKING: No Smoking Allowed in or on the Property 
LEASE LENGTH: 12-36 month minimum 
SPECIAL LEASE PROVISIONS: If not specified here, will be listed in lease agreement. 
HOW TO APPLY: The applications are found on our website, www.realpmgold.com/houses-rent located on the listing page. 
APPLICATION TURNAROUND TIME: 24 to 72 business hours 
ADDITIONAL FEES NOT INCLUDED IN RENT: 
* $50 Application Fee per applicant 18 or older 
* Deposit: 100% refundable, 
* $250 - $500 pet deposit per pet (if applicable) (100% refundable) 
Income Requirements -Minimum Gross Income Requirement (before taxes) is 3 times the rental rate of the property you would like to rent. 
Credit Requirements- Credit above 600 is preferred, however as long as there are no evictions on record and proof of rent or mortgage payment history is supplied showing on time rent payments for the previous year the applications with credit in the 500's will be considered. Student loans and medical bills will not be factored against the applicant. 
Security Deposits -Applicants with better credit and references will generally be approved at a security deposit of 1 months rent. Applicants with low credit may be approved with higher deposit.
Rental Terms: Rent: $2,200, Application Fee: $50, Security Deposit: $2,200, Available Now
Pet Policy: Cats not allowed, Dogs not allowed
This property allows self guided viewing without an appointment. Contact for details.

Description: Beautiful and spacious home on private, end of cul de sac, wooded lot, near pond. Master bath has soaking tub and separate shower. Large walk-in closest. Open floor plan with plenty of storage. Eat-in-kitchen adjacent to family room. Formal living and dining room with formal office. Finished basement with additional room, wet bar and full bathroom. Relax after a long day on large front porch or expansive deck facing the woods. Owners can provide furniture for some rooms, to include a bedroom set, dining room table and leather sectional. Also convenient to Dahlgren, Patuxent River Naval Air, and other installations in the Washington Metropolitan area. Please contact me to schedule a viewing.

Description: Huge 4 bedroom/3.5 bath home. Master bedroom has a step down sitting area, separate master bath and 2 walk-in closets. Entertain guests on the two-tiered deck overlooking the backyard and swing set or in the fully finished basement featuring a wet bar, and a potential theater room and gym. Carpet will be replaced on the main and upper bedroom levels. A must see property!

This property is only 19 miles away from the Anderson Air Force BaseAvailable Immediately! Don't Miss it!

Description: The Walldorf-Astor is a 96 unit affordable senior (55+) rental community in Charles County, Maryland. Known as the "gateway to Southern Maryland", the community is conveniently located near Washington, D.C. and Baltimore, MD. The development includes 96 units with 54 one bedroom and 42 two bedroom apartments. The apartments feature spacious floorplans, modern kitchens, central air, and large closets. The community offers a lounge, meeting and activity space, laundry facilities on every floor, a library, elevators, on-site management and a fitness room. Transportation services are provided several times daily. PLEASE NOTE: This is a 55+ affordable rental community, as such both age and income restrictions apply.

Description: With 15 different communities to choose from and a wide variety of apartment styles, you're sure to find something that suits your lifestyle at The Apartments of St. Charles. St. Charles is one of the area's premier planned communities with an abundance hiking and biking trails that interconnect throughout the community and some of the best shopping and dining steps from your door. You'll also enjoy a complimentary membership to the community recreation center, where you will find swimming pools, tennis courts, ball fields and playgrounds. Choose from one, two and three bedroom floor plans in a variety of building types. Our walk-up bungalows offer groups of one-story buildings, while traditional garden-style, luxury mid-rise buildings and townhomes offer spacious apartments, some with two-level living.Bungalows:PalmerCoachman's' LandingFox ChaseCrosslandGarden-Style:BrookmontSmallwood GardensHunter's RunNew ForestSheffield GreensGleneaglesThe Nines at GleneaglesThe Links at Gleneagles
